parameters.name: amine
parameters.description: Amine nucleophile for amide bond formation

notes.CCCCCCCC1=CC=C(C=C1)N: 4-heptylaniline - aromatic amine with long alkyl chain

parameters.name: coupling_reagent
parameters.description: Primary reagent for amide bond formation

notes.CCN=C=NCCCN(C)C: EDC - safest option, water-soluble byproducts, mild conditions
notes.CN(C)C(=[N+](C)C)N1C2=C(N=CC=C2)[N+](=N1: HATU - highly efficient, minimal racemization, expensive
notes.C1CCC(CC1)N=C=NC2CCCCC2: DCC - cost-effective, allergen hazard, difficult byproduct removal

notes.CCN(C(C)C)C(C)C: DIPEA - non-nucleophilic, standard for peptide synthesis
notes.NO_BASE: No base - suitable for some EDC reactions

parameters.name: additive_reagent
parameters.description: Additive to suppress racemization and improve coupling efficiency

notes.C1=CC=C2C(=C1)N=NN2O: HOBt - EXPLOSIVE HAZARD, use with extreme caution
notes.CCOC(=O)C(=NO)C#N: OxymaPure - safer HOBt alternative, green chemistry
notes.NO_ADDITIVE: No additive - suitable for some coupling reagent combinations

parameters.name: solvent
parameters.description: Primary solvent for amide coupling reaction

notes.CN(C)C=O: DMF - gold standard, excellent solvating properties, toxicity concerns
notes.C1CCOC1: THF - moderate polarity, good solvating properties

notes.25째C: Room temperature - standard for most couplings
notes.40째C: Elevated temperature - may improve difficult couplings

parameters.name: coupling_reagent_equiv
parameters.description: Equivalents of coupling reagent relative to carboxylic acid

parameters.name: amine_equiv
parameters.description: Equivalents of amine relative to carboxylic acid

parameters.name: base_equiv
parameters.description: Equivalents of base relative to carboxylic acid (0.0 for NO_BASE)

parameters.name: additive_equiv
parameters.description: Equivalents of additive relative to carboxylic acid (0.0 for NO_ADDITIVE)

measurements.name: relative_yield
measurements.description: Relative yield of amide product determined by LCMS with caffeine internal standard

metadata.created_by: Amide Coupling Manual Experiment Setup Team
metadata.purpose: Manual amide coupling optimization for 4 specific amines with 2-amino-1H-imidazole-5-carboxylic acid
safety_notes: HOBt is EXPLOSIVE - use OxymaPure when possible
DCC is a potent allergen - mandatory glove use
DMF has toxicity concerns - ensure proper ventilation
All reactions require fume hood operation
